events.content: I started working on Nexus back in January 2025. It's my personal knowledge management system that I've been building alongside my work at Anthropic. Casey has been helping me test it.
That's a cool project! A personal knowledge management system sounds useful. What's the tech stack?
It's built with Go for the backend, SQLite for storage, and I'm using the Gemini API for embeddings and extraction. The project also includes Cortex, which is the core memory engine.
I've been documenting everything in a spec file at docs/MEMORY_SYSTEM_SPEC.md. Can you help me review the entity resolution algorithm?

metadata.description: User discusses their personal project Nexus and its subcomponent Cortex
metadata.notes: Tests: Project entity (Nexus, Cortex), BUILDING/WORKING_ON relationships, STARTED_ON temporal literal, collaboration (Casey testing), Document reference
